result.execSummary:
The defendant Xavier A Watkins was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Burglary-Building or Dwelling [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.10(1m)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court
Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court
Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed
supervisions.notes: With credit for 22 days time served, with participation at the Day Reporting Center.  Huber privileges.  No electronic monitoring.

miscConds.notes: Restitution payable to Aloun M. for $2,084.00, joint and serveral with 14CF308 or civil judgment with tax intercept.  Bail to be applied if applicable.  Payable first during probation and that explicitly includes payment before DOC supervision fees.

Defendant to pay all applicable costs and surcharges, and supervision fees or CIVIL JUDGMENT will be entered.
Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank and pay all appropriate costs.
Obtain and maintain employment and/or school and/or vocational training.
Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon he may never possess a firearm or body armor.

Mental Health Evaluation and take all prescribed medications.
Court advised defendant that his voting rights are suspended and he may not vote in any election until his civil rights are restored.

Defendant to participate in Alcohol and Drug Assessment and successfully complete recommended treatment.
Maintain absolute sobriety.  No drugs.  No alcohol.  Unless medically assisted treatment.
Random urine screens and breathalyzer test.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: DENYING request for Restitution hearing.  Signed, scanned and filed, sdg.
Per Order of Presiding Judge, Felony Division, this request/motion is hereby assigned to the Hon. Carl Ashley, Br. 33, calendar successor, for review. spc
Defendant's pro se request for a restitution hearing.

records.descr: Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: (2), received and filed. lms

Defendant Xavier A Watkins in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Defendant Xavier A Watkins in custody.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.  

The defendant is not in compliance with the terms of the Deferred Prosecution Agreement.  Based upon the defendant's non-compliance and State's motion, the court revoked the Deferred Prosecution Agreement; proceedings reinstated.  Court orders entry of Judgment of Conviction.

Statements made as to sentencing.  Additional statements by: Monica W.

Defendant sentenced to serve 1 YEAR in the House of Correction with credit for 22 days time served, with participation at the Day Reporting Center.  Huber privileges.  No electronic monitoring.   COURT STAYED THE SENTENCE and placed the defendant on probation with the State of Wisconsin, Department of Corrections for a period of 2 YEARS.

CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:
* Mental Health Evaluation and take all prescribed medications.
* Defendant to participate in Alcohol and Drug Assessment
   and successfully complete recommended treatment.
* Maintain absolute sobriety.  No drugs.  No alcohol.  Unless medically assisted treatment.
* Random urine screens and breathalyzer test.
* Obtain and maintain employment and/or school and/or vocational training.
* Restitution payable to Aloun M. for $2,084.00, joint and serveral with 14CF308 or civil judgment with tax intercept.  Bail to be applied if applicable.  Payable first during probation and that explicitly includes payment before DOC supervision fees.
* Defendant to pay all applicable costs and surcharges,
   and supervision fees or CIVIL JUDGMENT will be entered.

Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank and pay all appropriate costs.  Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon he may never possess a firearm or body armor.  Court advised defendant that his voting rights are suspended and he may not vote in any election until his civil rights are restored.  

  Filed,
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief;
Pretrial Incarceration Credit.
Court ordered defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department pending sentencing.

Attorney Michael B Plaisted in court, defendant Xavier A Watkins not in court, in custody.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Defendant NOT produced. Defendant has pending charges. State is moving to dismiss the DPA and requests a Sentencing Hearing. Court granted the State's request.   Court ordered defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department pending sentencing. Case adjourned to branch 6.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for May 12, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Per email from State.  Case is adjourned from 7/13/2015 to 4/28/2015 at 8:30am. lms
Deferred Prosecution Agreement Non-Compliance report, received and filed. lms

Defendant Xavier A Watkins in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.

Defendant is maintaining sobriety.  Defendant has submitted a restitution payment.  Defendant has completed community service.  Defendant is no longer employed.  With agreement of parties, Court extends Deferred Prosecution Agreement to next court date.  Case adjourned for final review hearing in Branch 6.  Review hearing scheduled for July 13, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Deferred Prosecution Agreement Progress report, received and filed. lms

Defendant Xavier A Watkins in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court issued a warrant on 02-16-2015. Defendant appear in court on 02-17-2015 due to different date given. Court vacates the warrant. Defendant still needs to pay restitution.  Review hearing scheduled for March 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Attorney Michael B Plaisted in court.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  NO BAIL IS FORFEITED.
Deferred Prosecution Agreement Progress report, received and filed. lms

Defendant Xavier A Watkins in court with attorney Michael B. Plaisted.  Brad A. Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.  New counsel has been appointed.

Defendant has tested negative and attended JusticePoint contact.  Defendant is employed and needs to provide verification.  Defendant has begun community service.  Defendant needs to pay restitution.  Review hearing scheduled for February 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.  lms
Due to a conflict of interest, defense request to withdraw.  Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw granted by the Court.  Court ordered case adjourned for status of counsel in Branch 6.

Defendant has tested negative, attended all appointments and needs to begin community service.  Status conference scheduled for November 17, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Xavier A Watkins in court with attorney Reyna Ivonne Morales.  Brad A. Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.  OFF THE RECORD. Defendant Xavier A Watkins in court with attorney Rosemary Reyes Cuevas appearing as a friend of the court..  Brad A. Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Based upon the Defendant's compliance with Deferred Prosecution Agreement, matter is adjourned for a Review Hearing  / Status of Counsel in Branch 6.  Status conference scheduled for October 20, 2014 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Defense motion to withdraw heard and granted by the Court.  Attorney Lindgren to notify public defenders office of the need for successor counsel for review hearing before Branch 06.

Defendant Xavier A Watkins in court with attorney Kathleen A Lindgren.  Megan Patricia Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Parties are prepared to enter into a deferred prosecution agreement.  Hearing proceeded.

Defendant was advised of constitution rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights and entered a plea of GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights, Addendum, and Jury Instructions, received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the guilty plea.   Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the Information.  Court STAYS entry of judgment of conviction.  Deferred Prosecution Agreement received, signed and filed.  Review hearing scheduled for September 22, 2014 at 08:30 am. before Branch 06 Judge Ellen R. Brostrom.

Defendant Xavier A Watkins in court with attorney Kathleen A Lindgren.  Megan P Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter calendared for Deferred prosecution agreement hearing.  Due to congested calendar of the court (no time left), matter adjourned at this time.  New date selected with the parties.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for July 29, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Xavier A Watkins in court with attorney Kathleen A Lindgren.  Megan P Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter calendared for deferred prosecution agreement hearing.  Parties unable to proceed as defense is still seeking monitoring agency; adjournment granted.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for June 30, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Xavier A Watkins in court.  Megan P Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.
Matter before the Court for Deferred prosecution agreement hearing.  Attorney Lindgren unavailable on today's date due to an illness.  Defendant provided with next court date slip by the deputy.
  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for June 3, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Xavier A Watkins in court with attorney Kathleen A Lindgren.  Megan Patricia Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.
Status conference held between counsel.  Parties engaged in settlement negotiations.  Defense requests date for possible resolution of this matter.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for May 14, 2014 at 08:30 am.
from Milwaukee Job Corps Center on behalf of the defendant, filed.

Defendant Xavier A Watkins in court with Attorney Kathleen A. Lindgren.  Megan Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.
Scheduling conference held between the parties.  Parties engaged in settlement negotiations.  Status conference scheduled for March 25, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

AMENDMENT TO THE No Contact Order to include; that the defendant have no contact with the co-defendant, Len Perry.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Xavier A Watkins in court with attorney Kathleen A. Lindgren.  Megan Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed.  Court found probable cause and bound Defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Brash, Branch 21.   Original Information received and filed.  Copy given to Defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant was arraigned in open court and pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference in Branch 21.  Scheduling conference scheduled for February 19, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with ALOUN M. OR HIS RESIDENCE.
  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Xavier A Watkins in court with attorney Calvin R Malone.  Defendant Xavier A Watkins in custody.  Danielle E. Chojnacki appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge BRASH, Branch 21.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 6, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
